questions.question: Share a memory of a holiday. Where was it, who went, what happened?

answers.answer: we went two years ago to Bodrum whith two couple of friends for eight days, it was to short, because we want discover more and more things in this ar√©a, meet the local people because they are very friendly .
we stay in a beautiful hotel where we had taste para sailing,fantastic ! but we were a little frightened !
